snippet: Facebook's public offering will make a lot of billionaires and millionaires, some of them prominent people and others not, Nick Bilton and Evelyn M. Rusli report in The New York Times.
abstract: Facebook's public offering will make a lot of billionaires and millionaires, some of them prominent people and others not, Nick Bilton and Evelyn M. Rusli report in The New York Times.

headline.main: From Founders to Decorators, Facebook Riches
